trans-unit.source: Provides information about a regular expression that is used to compile a regular expression to a stand-alone assembly.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关使用正则表达式将正则表达式编译为独立程序集的信息。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> objects is passed to the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A> method to provide information about each regular expression to be included in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>对象传递给<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A>方法以提供有关要包括在程序集中的每个正则表达式的信息。

trans-unit.source: Each compiled regular expression that is included in the assembly is represented as a class derived from <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>.
trans-unit.target: 包含在程序集中每个编译正则表达式表示为从派生的类<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> type define the regular expression's class name, its fully qualified name (that is, its namespace and its type name), its regular expression pattern, any additional options (such as whether the regular expression is case-insensitive), and a time-out interval that specifies how long the regular expression engine should search for a match.
trans-unit.target: 属性<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>类型定义正则表达式的类名、 其完全限定的名称 （即，其命名空间和类型名称），其正则表达式模式、 任何其他选项 （如是否正则表达式不区分大小写），并指定正则表达式引擎搜索匹配项的多长时间的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> object by calling its overloaded class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 可以实例化<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>通过调用其重载的类构造函数的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression to compile.
trans-unit.target: 要编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression options to use when compiling the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 编译正则表达式时使用的正则表达式选项。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type that represents the compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示已编译的正则表达式的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace to which the new type belongs.
trans-unit.target: 新类型所属的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the compiled regular expression publicly visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要使所编译的正则表达式对公共可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo" /> class that contains information about a regular expression to be included in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo" /> 类的新实例，该类包含有关要在程序集内包括的正则表达式的信息。

trans-unit.source: Each parameter of the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor directly corresponds to a property of the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 每个参数的<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>构造函数直接对应的属性<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>类。

trans-unit.source: Because all properties are read/write, their values can also be assigned directly.
trans-unit.target: 因为所有的属性是读/写，也可以直接分配它们的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A> method generates an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A>方法将生成该程序集包含已编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not specify <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled> as one of the values of `options`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不应指定<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled>为的值之一`options`。

trans-unit.source: If `ispublic` is `true`, the compiled regular expression class is given public accessibility.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ispublic`是`true`，已编译的正则表达式类提供公共可访问性。

trans-unit.source: That is, it can be instantiated from code that executes in any assembly.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它可以执行的任何程序集中的代码中实例化。

trans-unit.source: If `ispublic` is `false`, the compiled regular expression class is given `internal` (in C#) or `Friend` (in Visual Basic) accessibility.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ispublic`是`false`，给定的已编译的正则表达式类`internal`（在 C# 中) 或`Friend`（在 Visual Basic) 可访问性。

trans-unit.source: That is, it can be instantiated only from code that executes in the same assembly as the regular expression class.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它可以只能从与正则表达式类相同的程序集中执行的代码实例化。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates and uses a compiled regular expression in two steps.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建并在两个步骤中使用已编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: In the first step, compile and execute the following code example.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个步骤中，编译并执行下面的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.%23ctor%2A> constructor in the code example defines a compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.%23ctor%2A>构造函数中的代码示例定义已编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The result of executing the code is an assembly named FishRegex.dll that contains a compiled regular expression type named `FishRegex`.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行代码的结果是名为 FishRegex.dll 包含名为的已编译的正则表达式类型的程序集`FishRegex`。

trans-unit.source: In the second step, compile the following code example using a reference to FishRegex.dll, and then run the resulting executable file.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个步骤中，编译下面的代码示例使用 FishRegex.dll，对的引用，然后运行生成的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: The executable file matches a target string by using the `FishRegex` type, and displays the match, group, capture group, and index position of the matches in the target string.
trans-unit.target: 按使用的可执行文件匹配的目标字符串`FishRegex`键入，并在目标字符串中显示匹配、 组、 捕获组和的匹配项的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pattern" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pattern" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fullnamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fullnamespace" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a compiled regular expression that uses the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建已编译的正则表达式使用在其中创建的应用程序域的默认超时值。

trans-unit.source: If a time-out value is defined for the application domain, the compiled regular expression uses the value <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />, which prevents a pattern-matching operation from timing out. The recommended constructor for creating a compiled regular expression is <see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.TimeSpan)" />, which lets you set the time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序域定义了超时值，已编译的正则表达式使用的值<see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" />，这将阻止从超时的模式匹配操作。创建已编译的正则表达式的建议构造函数是<see cref="M:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.TimeSpan)" />，可以在其中你设置的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression to compile.
trans-unit.target: 要编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression options to use when compiling the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 编译正则表达式时使用的正则表达式选项。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type that represents the compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示已编译的正则表达式的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace to which the new type belongs.
trans-unit.target: 新类型所属的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the compiled regular expression publicly visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要使所编译的正则表达式对公共可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default time-out interval for the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式的默认超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo" /> class that contains information about a regular expression with a specified time-out value to be included in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo" /> 类的新实例，该类包含有关要在程序集内包括的指定的超时值的信息。

trans-unit.source: Each parameter of the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor directly corresponds to a property of the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 每个参数的<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>构造函数直接对应的属性<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>类。

trans-unit.source: Because all properties are read/write, their values can also be assigned directly.
trans-unit.target: 因为所有的属性是读/写，也可以直接分配它们的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A> method generates an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A>方法将生成该程序集包含已编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not specify <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled> as one of the values of `options`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不应指定<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled>为的值之一`options`。

trans-unit.source: If `ispublic` is `true`, the compiled regular expression class is given public accessibility.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ispublic`是`true`，已编译的正则表达式类提供公共可访问性。

trans-unit.source: That is, it can be instantiated from code that executes in any assembly.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它可以执行的任何程序集中的代码中实例化。

trans-unit.source: If `ispublic` is `false`, the compiled regular expression class is given `internal` (in C#) or `Friend` (in Visual Basic) accessibility.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ispublic`是`false`，给定的已编译的正则表达式类`internal`（在 C# 中) 或`Friend`（在 Visual Basic) 可访问性。

trans-unit.source: That is, it can be instantiated only from code that executes in the same assembly as the regular expression class.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它可以只能从与正则表达式类相同的程序集中执行的代码实例化。

trans-unit.source: The `matchTimeout` parameter defines the default time-out interval for the compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: `matchTimeout`参数定义已编译的正则表达式的默认超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: This value represents the approximate amount of time that a compiled regular expression object will execute a single matching operation before the operation times out and the regular expression engine throws a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception during its next timing check.
trans-unit.target: 此值表示的近似之前在操作超时时并且正则表达式引擎将引发，已编译的正则表达式对象将执行单个匹配操作的时间量<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>在其下一步的计时检查过程中的异常.

trans-unit.source: For additional information about the time-out value, see the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 超时值有关的其他信息，请参阅<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you always set a default time-out value for a compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你始终设置已编译的正则表达式的默认超时值。

trans-unit.source: Consumers of your regular expression library can override that time-out value by passing a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that represents the new time-out interval to this constructor overload.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式库的使用者可以在通过传递的情况下重写该超时值<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值表示此构造函数重载的新的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a single compiled regular expression named `DuplicateChars` that identifies two or more occurrences of the same character in an input string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义名为单个编译的正则表达式`DuplicateChars`标识的输入字符串中的相同字符的两个或多个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The compiled regular expression has a default time-out of 2 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 已编译的正则表达式具有默认超时值为 2 秒。

trans-unit.source: When you execute the example, it creates a class library named RegexLib.dll that contains the compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 执行该示例时，它会创建一个名为包含已编译的正则表达式的 RegexLib.dll 类库。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `(\w)\1+` is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式 `(\w)\1+` 的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match any word character and assign it to the first capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 匹配任何单词字符，并将其分配给第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more occurrences of the value of the first captured group.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个匹配项的值的第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `DuplicatedChars` regular expression to identify duplicate characters in a string array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用`DuplicatedChars`正则表达式，以标识字符串数组中的重复字符。

trans-unit.source: When it calls the `DuplicatedChars` constructor, it changes the time-out interval to .5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 当它调用`DuplicatedChars`构造函数，它将更改为.5 秒超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pattern" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pattern" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fullnamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fullnamespace" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="matchTimeout" /> is negative, zero, or greater than approximately 24 days.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="matchTimeout" /> 为负、零或大于 24 天左右。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the compiled regular expression has public visibility.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示已编译的正则表达式是否具有公共可见性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the regular expression has public visibility; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正则表达式具有公共可见性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.IsPublic%2A> property is `false`, the regular expression class defined by the current instance can be instantiated only by code that is executing in the assembly that contains the class.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.IsPublic%2A>属性是`false`，由当前实例定义的正则表达式类可以仅通过中包含的类的程序集执行的代码实例化。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method generates an assembly that contains only compiled regular expressions and does not allow additional code to be added, there is generally no reason to assign this property a value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，因为<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法生成包含仅已编译的正则表达式，并且不允许其他代码要添加的程序集时，通常没有理由将此属性的值分配`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the regular expression's default time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置正则表达式的默认超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: The default maximum time interval that can elapse in a pattern-matching operation before a <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException" /> is thrown, or <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" /> if time-outs are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在样式对的操作可经过的默认最长时间间隔时间，在 <see cref="T:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException" /> 引发之前或 <see cref="F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout" /> ，如果挂起被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout%2A> property defines the default time-out interval for the compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout%2A>属性定义已编译的正则表达式的默认超时时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: This value represents the approximate amount of time that a compiled regular expression will execute a single matching operation before the operation times out and the regular expression engine throws a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception during its next timing check.
trans-unit.target: 此值表示的近似之前在操作超时时并且正则表达式引擎将引发，已编译的正则表达式将执行单个匹配操作的时间量<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>在其下一步的计时检查过程中的异常。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you always set a default time-out value for a compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你始终设置已编译的正则表达式的默认超时值。

trans-unit.source: Consumers of your regular expression library can override that time-out value by passing a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that represents the new time-out interval to the compiled regular expression's class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式库的使用者可以在通过传递的情况下重写该超时值<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值表示已编译的正则表达式的类构造函数的新的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: You can assign a default time-out value to a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> object in any of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 你可以分配到一个默认超时值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>处于以下任一对象：

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and providing the string representation of a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value for the "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" property.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并提供的字符串表示形式<xref:System.TimeSpan>"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"属性值。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29> constructor and providing a value for the `matchTimeout` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29>构造函数和提供的值`matchTimeout`参数。

trans-unit.source: By setting the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: To set a reasonable time-out interval, consider the following factors:
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的合理的超时间隔，请考虑以下因素：

trans-unit.source: The length and complexity of the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 长度和复杂性的正则表达式模式。

trans-unit.source: Longer and more complex regular expressions require more time than shorter and simpler ones.
trans-unit.target: 长而复杂的正则表达式需要比更简短和简单的更多时间。

trans-unit.source: The expected machine load.
trans-unit.target: 预期的机负载。

trans-unit.source: Processing takes more time on systems with high CPU and memory utilization.
trans-unit.target: 处理在具有高的 CPU 和内存利用率系统上花费更多时间。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a single compiled regular expression named `DuplicateChars` that identifies two or more occurrences of the same character in an input string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义名为单个编译的正则表达式`DuplicateChars`标识的输入字符串中的相同字符的两个或多个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The compiled regular expression has a default time-out of 2 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 已编译的正则表达式具有默认超时值为 2 秒。

trans-unit.source: When you execute the example, it creates a class library named RegexLib.dll that contains the compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 执行该示例时，它会创建一个名为包含已编译的正则表达式的 RegexLib.dll 类库。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `(\w)\1+` is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式 `(\w)\1+` 的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Match any word character and assign it to the first capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 匹配任何单词字符，并将其分配给第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more occurrences of the value of the first captured group.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个匹配项的值的第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `DuplicatedChars` regular expression to identify duplicate characters in a string array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用`DuplicatedChars`正则表达式，以标识字符串数组中的重复字符。

trans-unit.source: When it calls the `DuplicatedChars` constructor, it changes the time-out interval to .5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 当它调用`DuplicatedChars`构造函数，它将更改为.5 秒超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type that represents the compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示已编译的正则表达式的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new type.
trans-unit.target: 新类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> class is used to define a compiled regular expression, which is represented as a class derived from <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>类用于定义已编译的正则表达式，表示为从派生的类<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Name%2A> property defines the class name of the regular expression type, and the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Namespace%2A> and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Name%2A> properties together define its fully qualified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Name%2A>属性定义的正则表达式类型的类名称和<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Namespace%2A>和<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Name%2A>属性共同定义其完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace to which the new type belongs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新类型所属的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the new type.
trans-unit.target: 新类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo> class is used to define a compiled regular expression, which is represented as a class derived from <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo>类用于定义已编译的正则表达式，表示为从派生的类<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Namespace%2A> property defines the namespace that contains the compiled regular expression type, and the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Namespace%2A> and <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Name%2A> properties together define its fully qualified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Namespace%2A>属性定义包含已编译的正则表达式类型的命名空间和<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Namespace%2A>和<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Name%2A>属性共同定义其完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the options to use when compiling the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置编译正则表达式时使用的选项。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A> method generates an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A>方法将生成该程序集包含已编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not have to specify <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled> as one of the values of this property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你不必指定<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled>作为此属性的值之一。

trans-unit.source: If it is present, the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled> option is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled>忽略选项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the regular expression to compile.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression to compile.
trans-unit.target: 要编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Pattern%2A> property can contain any valid regular expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Pattern%2A>属性可以包含任何有效的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Pattern%2A> property is not a syntactically correct regular expression pattern, the call to the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A> method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.Pattern%2A>属性不是语法正确的正则表达式模式中，调用<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值为 <see langword="null" />。
